column2: "As usual, the request details are plain and simple. Just kill all of the D-arkers that you can."

"Only the location has changed,
but what you do is the same."

"However, these D-arkers will be
somewhat different that those in the past. ...if you lose focus, you'll die."

"Well, let's not waste any more time.
Kill them all completely. Those bastards can't be in this world anymore."

"例によって依頼内容は単純明快。
ダーカーを殺せるだけ殺してこい、だ。"

"場所が変わっただけで
やるべきことは同じだ。"

"ただし、これまでに相手した
ダーカーとは一味違う。
……気を抜けば、死ぬぞ。"

"さあ、これ以上は時間の無駄だ。
徹底的に完膚無きまでぶっ潰せ。
この世界にいてはならないあいつらを。"
